LanguageData.AteFoodJamToast.stages.0.label: A small luxury
LanguageData.AteFoodBreaktime.stages.0.label: So yummy! This is the best food: ever!
LanguageData.AteFoodBreaktime.stages.0.description: I'm so happy that I can eat like this, especially during such hard times.
LanguageData.RiceAteMealSimple.stages.0.label: I ate white rice!
LanguageData.RiceAteMealSimple.stages.0.description: The effort was worth this taste.
LanguageData.RiceAteFineMeal.stages.0.label: I ate tasty white rice!
LanguageData.RiceAteFineMeal.stages.0.description: That meal was completely and utterly amazing.
LanguageData.RiceAteLavishMeal.stages.0.label: I ate delicious white rice!!!
LanguageData.RiceAteLavishMeal.stages.0.description: It's amazing that such a taste exists. Maybe this world isn't that bad after all.
LanguageData.AteCurryRice.stages.0.label: Curry Fury!
LanguageData.AteCurryRice.stages.0.description: The flavor dances in my mouth. I should have more!
LanguageData.RiceDrinkWater.stages.0.label: おいしい水
LanguageData.RiceDrinkWater.stages.0.description: 安心安全なきれいな水を飲めた。
